tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
At one time, I used to regularly visit Clove. Only about 2- 3 years‚Äô ago did I first consult Dr. Ojha at the White Willow dental clinic in Saket; which clinic I had first visited solely in view of the fact that the same is literally right next to where I live. Ever since, I have been going to Dr. Ojha for most of my dental treatment; which is attributable to the following reasons:- 

Firstly, Dr. Ojha is that he takes the trouble to explain the issue at hand to his patient in detail; and thereafter, suggests a line of dental treatment only after giving his reasons for the same. 

Secondly, at no stage did Dr. Ojha ever refuse to answer, or even give half-hearted answers, to any of my queries re the proposed dental treatment. 

Thirdly, Dr. Ojha does not hesitate to recommend all dental treatment which he may deem necessary; so that the issue is not only suitably dealt with, but also does not re-occur (even if that entails RCT and capping). 

Fourthly, Dr. Ojha is well-qualified; in as much as he is an alumnus of Manipal in Karnataka. 

Fifthly and lastly, Dr. Ojha‚Äôs clinic is extremely clean; and has been that way even prior to the outbreak of ‚ÄòCOVID- 19‚Äô. 

All in all, I would highly recommend Dr. Ojha; and wish him all the best.
reply_text: Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Painless Single visit root canal treatment,
review: I  recommend Dr. Prashant because he explained my tooth problem thoroughly and clearly outlined the treatment procedures, making everything smooth and leaving me satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ojha made me feel very comfortable and advised me on my condition and proposed treatment. 
He assured and then ensured he met the committed timelines. I appreciated his scheduling the treatment process to meet my convenience and called me to followup up , which is rare in this profession..
The entire process was gentle, painless and without LA which actually shocked me and spoke volumes of the dexterity of the Doc. 
He maintains top notch hygeine and has a very good team. 
Will surely recommend all my known people to go to Dr. Ojha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Surgery,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,GIC Tooth Fillings,
review:
Dr. Prashant Ojha and his team have been an absolute pleasure. Each and every time that I have walked into this office I am met with a friendly and smiling face.
For as long as I can remember I have had anxiety when going to dental appointments, from the first time I stepped foot into white willow Dental I could tell that their atmosphere was different.  Dr.Prashant Ojha was gentle and discussed with me what products I should and shouldn't be using. From there he walked me through the treatment plan needed in order to get my teeth back to their former glory. My three appointments with Dr. Ojha to complete my treatment have all been painless and effective.
You are presented with the treatment plan and costs well in advance to your next appointment so there are never any surprises. I would recommend  white willow dental to anyone in the Delhi and near by area that is looking for a dentist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to him for the first time for consultation. He has not given any consultation or advice, rather he started operating on my teeth and after an hour approx I found my half teeth has gone. He did root canaling ******* ** *********** First he said 15 years of gaurantee but after that he said 10 years of gaurantee on teeth cap. Cap broken within first year and again he charged some amount and provided me a new cap. Now cap coming out after every 15-30 days of interval, after calling him, he isusing bad language and abusing and making excuses. I will never recommend anyone to him.
reply_text: I‚Äôm sorry that you feel like your experience with us. As a team we we strive everyday to take exceptional care of our patients, so it is always disappointing when we hear that someone has anything less than an exceptional experience. Maybe we could have done a better job of communication.

review: It was a great experience with the doctors here. Dr. Prashant ojha chair side manner and patience in explaining all word involved made me feel very comfortable, a nice environment n very clean clinics they have. took very good care of my teeth. I had three implants and one bridge done, also zoom whiting. Outstanding experience.. Best doctors for the dental care I found here. The clinic staff is very friendly and professional. Have already recommended Dr. Prashant ojha to all friends and would recommend his services wholeheartedly. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Prashant Ojha an amazing dentist. He is one of the nicest people you will ever meet, and his work is exceptional. He is calm, detail- oriented, perfectionist and diligent. He believes in personal and individual service.
Here are some of my favorite aspects of his practice:
-You will not leave his office until you and Dr.Prashant Ojha satisfied with his work
-He really listens to you and cares about your well-being
-He personally performs your dental cleanings, instead of a dental hygienist
-He calls to check on you after your dental work is done
-He focuses on healthy teeth, not just aesthetics
-His staff is great at calling you to remind you of your appointment
-There is never a wait as runs his appointments on time
-The office is modern and clean
Hands down, **** ******* *** **** **** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I can  honestly say I have never had a better dental experience in my life.  Dr.  Prashant Ojha chair side Manner is unparalleled. His office is always impeccably clean and his staff is always friendly,  kind,  and answers any and all questions I have.  above all else,  Dr Prashant Ojha is outstanding.  I got veneers  on my two front teeth and they look so natural there is literally no way you would ever know they weren't real..  thank you Dr.  Prashant Ojha and team for giving me the smile I've always dreamed of.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.prashant ojha is GREAT. I would recommend him with my eyes closed.since the first day I went for consultation I knew I had chosen a right doctor. dr.ojha and his staff are super friendly, humble and made me feel super comfortable throughout the entire process.i had very complex case and he did amazing job.i will be eternally grateful to him. He not only changed my smile, but he changed my life.  I am very detailed oriented person .he did implant, delivered porcelain veneer and bridge better than I could even expect. They look natural,with beautiful shape,nice color. I get compliment all the time.Dr.ojha and his team are by far the BEST!!!!!!

tags: None
review: The consultation was very thorough and systematic. Seemed very professional & experienced. Handling was very good & even the staff was very friendly

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was very nice and professional. The staff was courteous as well. He explained me my problem and told me what he needs to do to fix the problem. I said okay go ahead. After the process which didn't last long, maybe 10-15 minutes, he made a bill of 4700. I am a student and was extremely surprised. I guess I figured that if something is that expensive, he would tell me before he starts the procedure (it isn't really a huge clinic or hospital, so you don't expect extravagant costs). Well, till here I guess the mistake is on both my side and his. I should've asked the cost and he(knowing that I'm just a student) should've told. Coming on to the worse part, the treatment didn't really work. It's been like 8 months and I still feel sensitivity in those teeth only, the ones he fixed. And it's not like the problem reemerged, it never went away. It's just that I am extremely busy and stressed with exams, career, etc that I am ignoring it. Being an adult who still relies on her parents' money because I'm studying, I feel really bad for the 4700 Rs. I spent on it with no return at all. After months of procrastination and the discomfort in my teeth after eating an ice cream, I am writing my experience with this clinic.

and crown given to you is just temporary crown that only for few days .. plz come for permanent crown..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have visited along with my friend Poonam for her RCT and filling procedure in the teeth. Doctor was very friendly and performed all the procedure and taken amount for it also claiming that all the necessary procedure are done. My friend Poonam still had problem after several days of procedure and thought to visit another doctor. The other doctor informed that RCT was not performed but actually just the teeth is opened, cleaned and filled. He had also given reports along with x-rays. When my friend had gone back to Prashant Ojha's clinic, he accepted that RCT is not performed and asked my friend if she is intended to do the RCT now. My friend lost trust on this doctor and his procedure, she is still suffering from teeth related problems and consulting another doctor to cure herself.
